verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of all his <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>:
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>, and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>;

The <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H6697>rock<s%>; in him will I <S%H2620>trust<s%>: he is my <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>, and my <S%H4498>refuge<s%>, my <S%H3467>savior<s%>; you <S%H3467>save<s%> me from <S%H2555>violence<s%>.
I will <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: so shall I be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from my <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
When the <S%H4867>waves<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>surrounded<s%> <S%H5158>me<s%>, the floods of ungodly <S%H1100>men<s%> made me <S%H1204>afraid<s%>;
The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> surrounded me <S%H5437>about<s%>; the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> met <S%H6923>me<s%>;

In my <S%H6862>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H7121>cried<s%> to my <S%H430>God<s%>: and he did <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of his <S%H1964>temple<s%>, and my <S%H7775>cry<s%> did enter into his <S%H241>ears<s%>.

Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>trembled<s%>; the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7264>moved<s%> and <S%H1607>shook<s%>, because he was <S%H2734>angry<s%>.

There went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%>, and <S%H784>fire<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%>: <S%H1513>coals<s%> were kindled by <S%H1197>it<s%>.
He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3381>also<s%>, and came down; and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> was under his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
And he <S%H7392>rode<s%> upon a <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and did <S%H5774>fly<s%>: and he was <S%H7200>seen<s%> upon the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind<s%>.
And he <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H5521>pavilions<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H2841>him<s%>, dark <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H7834>skies<s%>.
Through the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> before him were <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>kindled<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7481>thundered<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and the most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>.
And he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H1300>them<s%>; lightning, and defeated <S%H2000>them<s%>.

And the <S%H650>channels<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%>, the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, at the <S%H1606>rebuking<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, at the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H4791>above<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4871>me<s%>; he drew me out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>;
He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H341>enemy<s%>, and from them that <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H553>me<s%>: for they were too strong for me.
They <S%H6923>met<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity<s%>: but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was my <S%H4937>support<s%>.
He brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> also into a large <S%H4800>place<s%>: he <S%H2502>delivered<s%> <S%H2654>me<s%>, because he delighted in me.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>: according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> has he recompensed <S%H7725>me<s%>.
For I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and have not wickedly <S%H7561>departed<s%> from my <S%H430>God<s%>.
For all his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> were before <S%H2708>me<s%>: and as for his statutes, I did not depart from <S%H5493>them<s%>.
I was also <S%H8549>upright<s%> before <S%H8104>him<s%>, and have kept myself from my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
Therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me according to my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; according to my <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> in his eye <S%H5048>sight<s%>.
With the <S%H2623>merciful<s%> you will show yourself <S%H2616>merciful<s%>, and with the <S%H8549>upright<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> you will show yourself <S%H8552>upright<s%>.
With the <S%H1305>pure<s%> you will show yourself <S%H1305>pure<s%>; and with the <S%H6141>perverse<s%> you will show yourself <S%H6617>unsavoury<s%>.
And the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> you will <S%H3467>save<s%>: but your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are upon the <S%H7311>haughty<s%>, that you may bring them <S%H8213>down<s%>.
For you are my <S%H5216>lamp<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5050>lighten<s%> my <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
For by you I have <S%H7323>run<s%> through a <S%H1416>troop<s%>: by my <S%H430>God<s%> have I leaped <S%H1801>over<s%> a <S%H7791>wall<s%>.

As for <S%H410>God<s%>, his <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect<s%>; the <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H6884>tried<s%>: he is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to all them that trust in <S%H2620>him<s%>.
For who is <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H1107>except<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? and who is a <S%H6697>rock<s%>, <S%H1107>except<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>?
<S%H410>God<s%> is my <S%H4581>strength<s%> and <S%H2428>power<s%>: and he <S%H5425>makes<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8549>perfect<s%>.
He <S%H7737>makes<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7737>like<s%> <S%H355>hinds<s%>' <S%H5975>feet<s%>: and sets me upon my high <S%H1116>places<s%>.
He <S%H3925>teaches<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%>; so that a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>steel<s%> is <S%H5181>broken<s%> by my <S%H2220>arms<s%>.
You have also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation<s%>: and your <S%H6031>gentleness<s%> has made me <S%H7235>great<s%>.
You have <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> under <S%H7166>me<s%>; so that my feet did not <S%H4571>slip<s%>.
I have <S%H7291>pursued<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>; and turned not again until I had consumed <S%H3615>them<s%>.
And I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H4272>them<s%>, and wounded <S%H6965>them<s%>, that they could not arise: <S%H5307>Yes<s%>, they are fallen under my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
For you have <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>: those that rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against me have you subdued under <S%H3766>me<s%>.
You have also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H6203>necks<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies<s%>, that I might <S%H6789>destroy<s%> them that hate <S%H8130>me<s%>.
They <S%H8159>looked<s%>, but there was none to <S%H3467>save<s%>; even unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, but he answered them <S%H6030>not<s%>.

Then did I <S%H7833>beat<s%> them as small as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, I did <S%H1854>stamp<s%> them as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>street<s%>, and did spread them <S%H7554>abroad<s%>.

You also have <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H7379>strivings<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, you have <S%H8104>kept<s%> me to be <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>: a <S%H5971>people<s%> which I <S%H3045>knew<s%> not shall serve <S%H5647>me<s%>.
<S%H1121>Strangers<s%> shall <S%H3584>submit<s%> themselves unto <S%H8085>me<s%>: as soon as they hear, they shall be obedient unto <S%H8085>me<s%>.
<S%H1121>Strangers<s%> shall fade <S%H5034>away<s%>, and they shall come <S%H2296>afraid<s%> out of their close <S%H4526>places<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>; and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock<s%>; and <S%H7311>exalted<s%> be the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.
It is <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5414>avenges<s%> <S%H3381>me<s%>, and that brings down the people under <S%H5971>me<s%>,

And that brings me <S%H3318>forth<s%> from my <S%H341>enemies<s%>: you also have lifted me up on <S%H7311>high<s%> above them that rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H5337>me<s%>: you have delivered me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
Therefore I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto your <S%H8034>name<s%>.

He is the <S%H4024>tower<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> for his <S%H4428>king<s%>: and <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
